About us


Geeks of London Ltd organises meetups for all different types of geeks, from movie geeks and comic book geeks, to scifi geeks and ice cream geeks.

We hold various events/meetups, from small meetup events to BarCamps, HackCamps, and other unconferences. Have a look at the events section to see some of our upcoming events.

Our team currently consists of Melinda Seckington, Kevin Prince, Cristiano Betta and Robert Lee-Cann. We also have a very large group of people helping us out during the events.

If you have any ideas, or you want to run your own Geeks of London theme event, please email us on info@geeksoflondon.com.
